name: YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles
author: YITH

sections.description:
Bundles are the best way to offer deals and unmissable mix of products to your customers: with YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles you will be able to do it easily and quickly!
Set how many items you bundle should have and choose the single products: they will be showed clearly in the bundle detail page and your customers will be free to appreciate the combinations you have created.

Features:

  • Create a product bundle
  • Assign how many simple products you want

Suggestions

If you have suggestions about how to improve YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles, you can write us so we can enhance our YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles plugin.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)

If you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send gettext PO and MO file
use so we can bundle it into YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles from Plugins page

YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles will add a new product type called “Product Bundle” in the Admin Product Edit page.

short_description: YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles allows you to bundle WooCommerce products and sell them with a unique price.
description:
Bundles are the best way to offer deals and unmissable mix of products to your customers: with YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles you will be able to do it easily and quickly!
Set how many items you bundle should have and choose the single products: they will be showed clearly in the bundle detail page and your customers will be free to appreciate the combinations you have created.

Features:

  • Create a product bundle
  • Assign how many simple products you want

Suggestions

If you have suggestions about how to improve YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles, you can write us so we can enhance our YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles plugin.

Translators

Available Languages

  • English (Default)

If you have created your own language pack, or have an update for an existing one, you can send gettext PO and MO file
use so we can bundle it into YITH WooCommerce Product Bundles
